tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE hazardous_waste_services (
    service_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    service_date DATE,
    waste_type TEXT,
    quantity INTEGER,
    pickup_location TEXT,
    disposal_location TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE hazardous_waste_pickup_services (
    service_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    service_date DATE,
    waste_type VARCHAR(50),
    pickup_location VARCHAR(100),
    disposal_location VARCHAR(100),
    scheduled_by_user_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE pickup_schedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    service_id INT,
    scheduled_date TIMESTAMP,
    pickup_completed BOOL,
    disposal_completed BOOL
);

CREATE TABLE schedules (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    pickup_date DATE,
    pickup_time TIME,
    address VARCHAR(255),
    status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE pickups (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    schedule_id INT,
    waste_type_id INT,
    quantity DECIMAL,
    status VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (schedule_id) REFERENCES schedules(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (waste_type_id) REFERENCES waste_types(id)
);

CREATE TABLE hazardous_waste_services (
	service_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	customer_id INT,
	service_date DATE,
	waste_type VARCHAR(50),
	status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE service_logs (
	log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	service_id INT,
	provider_id INT,
	site_id INT,
	timestamp TIMESTAMP,
	log_details TEXT
);
